# Data source


```{r read_Sabine_Cant_file, eval=FALSE}

Cant <- read_csv(here::here("data/GLODAPv1_1/_summarized_files",
                       "Cant_Sabine_2004.csv"))

Cant_inv <- read_csv(here::here("data/GLODAPv1_1/_summarized_files",
                       "Cant_inv_Sabine_2004.csv"))


```

```{r read_Gruber_Cant_file, eval=FALSE}

dcant %>% 
  write_csv(here::here("data/Gruber_2019/_summarized_files",
                       "dcant.csv"))

dcant_inv %>% 
  write_csv(here::here("data/Gruber_2019/_summarized_files",
                       "dcant_inv.csv"))

```
